name: animal-bite-cypress-tests
description: Comprehensive Cypress test suite for Animal Bite Incident Reporting System

scripts.test:reset: npm run test:cleanup && npm run test:setup
scripts.test:all: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:smoke: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run:smoke && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:regression: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run:regression && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:auth: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run:auth && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:admin: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run:admin && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:staff: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run:staff && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:user: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run:user && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run:integration && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:security: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run --spec 'cypress/e2e/integration/security-flow.cy.js' && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:performance: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run --spec 'cypress/e2e/integration/complete-workflow.cy.js' && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:accessibility: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run --spec 'cypress/e2e/**/*.cy.js' --env accessibility=true && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:mobile: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run --spec 'cypress/e2e/**/*.cy.js' --env mobile=true && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:desktop: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run --spec 'cypress/e2e/**/*.cy.js' --env desktop=true && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:chrome: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run:chrome && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:firefox: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run:firefox && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:edge: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run:edge && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:headed: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run:headed && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:debug: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run:headed --no-exit && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run:ci && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:parallel: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run:parallel && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:record: npm run test:setup && npm run cypress:run:record && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:check: npm run test:lint && npm run test:format && npm run test:validate
scripts.test:help: echo 'Available test commands:' && npm run | grep 'test:' | grep -v 'test:help'

author: Animal Bite System Team
